Upon receiving fatal damage in battle, this is the chance to retain #b1 HP. If your #yResistance exceeds #b100%, it must succeed. NL Once triggered, the value of #yResistance is halved. and all subsequent #yResistance gains will also be halved until the game ends.
Number of turns in this battle. Enemies gradually grow stronger with each turn.

TEXT_DICT.USE_MORIMENS_POWER_ICON: Use the Buff/Debuff icons from Morimens
TEXT_DICT.AWAKENER_ENCOUNTER_MOD_MONSTER: Awakeners can encounter monsters from Morimens
TEXT_DICT.OTHER_CHAR_ENCOUNTER_MOD_MONSTER: Non-Awakener characters can also encounter monsters from Morimens

TEXT: Gain #b200 #yKeyflare. Choose #b1 card from the Draw Pile or Discard Pile and add it to your hand, reducing its [E] Cost to #b0. Shuffle #b1 "Insight" into the Draw Pile.
EXTRA_TEXT: Based on "Mundus Decree", apply #pWeak and #rVulnerable to all enemies for #b1 turn. The next #yPosse released by consuming #yKeyflare will take effect twice.

TEXT: damage to all enemies #b2 times. In this battle, for each #yStrike played, increase damage by #b
. Add #b2 "Strike" with #yExhaust and #yEthereal to your hand.
EXTRA_TEXT: Base on "Beast of Chaos", deal an additional #yFixed #yDamage equal to #b15% of the target's Max HP to all enemies. The Base Damage of "Beast of Chaos" is increased by #b100% for this battle.

TEXT: Gain #b200 #yKeyflare. Place Base Copies of the last #b3 different #ynon-Exhaust #ynon-Ethereal #yCommand #yCards played last turn into hand, reducing their [E] Cost by #b1 and grants them #yExhaust and #yEthereal. If there are not enough #yCommand #yCards to place in your hand, draw an equal number of cards instead. Choose an arbitrary #yPosse to replace the current #yPosse, and restore it after using the #yPosse or at the end of the battle.
EXTRA_TEXT: Based on "Paradox Converged", gain #b3 stacks of #yNegentropy that ignores the stacking limit, reduce the [E] Cost of copied cards to #b0.

TEXT: 點 #y狂氣 。對所有敵人施加 #b
層 #p中毒 ，基礎傷害、基礎 #p中毒 、基礎 #b荊棘、基礎 #y觸腕傷害 #y臨時 提高 #b50% 。 NL 「 #p終末型態 」：額外抽 #b3 張牌，獲得 #b3 點 [E] ，觸發所有敵人 #b50% 的 #p中毒 ， #y狂氣 上限提高 #b50 點，至多提高 #b3 次。
EXTRA_TEXT: 點 #y狂氣 。對所有敵人施加 #b

層 #p中毒 ，基礎傷害、基礎 #p中毒 、基礎 #b荊棘、基礎 #y觸腕傷害 #y臨時 提高 #b50% 。基礎傷害、基礎 #p中毒 、基礎 #b荊棘 提高 #b10% 。額外獲得 #b1 層「 #p終末 」。 NL 「 #p終末型態 」：額外抽 #b3 張牌，獲得 #b3 點 [E] ，觸發所有敵人 #b50% 的 #p中毒 ，每消耗 #b10 點 #y狂氣 ，額外觸發所有敵人 #b3% 的 #p中毒 。施放 #y狂氣爆發 所需要的 #y狂氣 和 #y狂氣 上限提高 #b50 點，至多提高 #b3 次。

TEXT: 倍自身 #p中毒 加成。觸發所有敵人的 #p中毒 。「自我的葬儀」享受的自身 #p中毒 加成倍率提高 #b1 。
EXTRA_TEXT: 造成的基礎中毒 #b+50% ，持續 #b3 回合。
